Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products Anti-HAV Total Reagent Pack
VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products Anti-HAV Total Calibrators
VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products Anti-HAV Total Controls
Analyte(s): Total antibody to Hepatitis A virus (IgG and IgM)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS Immunodiagnostic Anti-HAV Total Reagent, Calibrator, and Controls for qualitative detection of HAV antibodies using competitive enzyme immunoassay.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of total antibody (IgG and IgM) to hepatitis A virus in human adult and pediatric serum or plasma as an aid in the diagnosis of acute or past infection and identification of HAV-susceptible individuals prior to vaccination, using the VITROS ECi/ECiQ Immunodiagnostic System.
